CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic properties of the three copolymers PDTP-BT , PDTP - DTBT and PDTP-DT2BT were studied by fabricating bulk heterojunction BHJ - type PSCs with a conventional sandwich configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC 70 BM / Ca / Al.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-BT |
| PDTP-DTBT |
| PDTP-DT2BT |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| Polymer |
| PC 70 BM |
| Ca |
| Al |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-BT |
| PDTP-DTBT |
| PDTP-DT2BT |
| Polymer (specific name not given) |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| PC 70 BM |
| Ca |
| Al |

Note: ITO (Indium Tin Oxide) was not included as it is typically considered a substrate or electrode material rather than a polymer or material for the active layer in photovoltaic devices.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic properties of the three copolymers PDTP-BT , PDTP - DTBT and PDTP-DT2BT were studied by fabricating bulk heterojunction BHJ - type PSCs with a conventional sandwich configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC 70 BM / Ca / Al.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

The entities "conventional sandwich configuration", "Ca" were removed as they do not clearly refer to material properties. "Ca" refers to Calcium, which is not a material property but rather a substance used in the fabrication process. "Conventional sandwich configuration" is a method or technique used in the fabrication process and not a material property.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic properties of the three copolymers PDTP-BT , PDTP - DTBT and PDTP-DT2BT were studied by fabricating bulk heterojunction BHJ - type PSCs with a conventional sandwich configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC 70 BM / Ca / Al.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value            |
|--------------------------|

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

The entities "ITO", "PEDOT : PSS", "Ca", and "Al" do not clearly refer to the value of a material property. "ITO" is a conductive material, "PEDOT : PSS" is a conducting polymer, "Ca" is a calcium ion, and "Al" is aluminum. These entities do not have a specific value associated with them in the context of the paragraph.
